meanings.definition: An attractive combination of vitality and glamour.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit had a touch of pzazz that made her stand out.
meanings.sent2: The fashion show was full of pzazz with bright colors and sparkles.
meanings.sent3: The party lacked pzazz until the disco ball started spinning.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline had a certain pzazz as the lights twinkled in the night.
meanings.sent5: The singer's performance was filled with pzazz, captivating the audience.

meanings.sent1: His dance moves had pzazz, impressing everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The actor's performance had just the right amount of pzazz to keep the audience engaged.
meanings.sent3: The chef added a bit of pzazz to the dish by sprinkling colorful spices on top.
meanings.sent4: The car had a sleek design with a hint of pzazz in its curves.
meanings.sent5: The fashion designer's collection was full of pzazz, showcasing bold patterns and textures.

meanings.definition: A quality of being exciting or attractive.
meanings.sent1: The theme park was buzzing with pzazz, drawing in visitors from all around.
meanings.sent2: The advertisement had a touch of pzazz that made it memorable.
meanings.sent3: The magician's tricks added an element of pzazz to the show.
meanings.sent4: The painting had a certain pzazz that captured the viewer's attention.
meanings.sent5: The new restaurant had a lot of pzazz with its vibrant decor and lively atmosphere.
